ca.ualberta.cmput301f14t16.easya.Model

Class Sort

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301f14t16.easya.Model.Sort

  • public class Sort
extends java.lang.Object
    Sort is a helper class that provides several methods that can sort lists of QuestionList object. This class provides methods to sort by number of upvotes, whether or not the question object has a picture, or by date. All sorts may be performed from smallest to greatest, or greatest to smallest.
    Author:
    Klinton

      Sorts the passed list by the presence of a picture.
      static java.util.List<QuestionList> sortUpVote(boolean sortOrder, java.util.List<QuestionList> questionList)
      Sorts the passed list by total number of upvotes received.

    • Method Detail

      • sortUpVote

        public static java.util.List<QuestionList> sortUpVote(boolean sortOrder,
                                                      java.util.List<QuestionList> questionList)
        Sorts the passed list by total number of upvotes received.
        Parameters:
        sortOrder - If True, the list will be sorted by greatest to smallest, if False, the list will be sorted by smallest to greatest.
        questionList - The list of Topic objects to be sorted.
        Returns:
        The sorted list.

      • pictureSort

        public static java.util.List<QuestionList> pictureSort(boolean sortOrder,
                                                       java.util.List<QuestionList> questionList)
        Sorts the passed list by the presence of a picture.
        Parameters:
        sortOrder - If True, the list will be sorted with the Topic objects containing pictures first. If False, the list will be sorted with the Topic objects not containing pictures first.
        questionList - The list of Topic objects to be sorted.

      • dateSort

        public static java.util.List<QuestionList> dateSort(boolean sortOrder,
                                                    java.util.List<QuestionList> questionList)
        Sorts the passed list by date.
        Parameters:
        sortOrder - If True, the list will be sorted by most newest to oldest, if False, the list will be sorted by oldest to newest.
        questionList - The list of Topic objects to be sorted.
        Returns:
        The sorted list.
